definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: Workshop director of high-strength comrades wholeheartedly welcome customers to negotiate business.
sentences.chinese: 車間主任高強同志竭誠歡迎廣大客戶前來洽談業務。

sentences.english: A workbench is set up to assemble analog cameras in the Leica assembly room.
sentences.chinese: 在徠卡的裝配車間裏，安置着組裝類似相機的工作臺。

sentences.english: The workshop in the picture is very high which makes tests of both small and large airplanes possible.
sentences.chinese: 圖片中的車間非常高，好讓大小飛機都能在這裏測試。

sentences.english: An ant colony optimization based algorithm for permutation flow shop scheduling was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種求解置換流水車間調度的蟻羣優化算法。

sentences.english: When I go into the workshop, I will teach you how to operate an NC machine.
sentences.chinese: 當我走進車間時，我將要教會你們如何操作數控機牀。

sentences.english: The workshop director introduced a worker and engineer to us.
sentences.chinese: 車間主任把一位工人工程師介紹給我們。

sentences.english: I washed, combed my hair and went to the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 我洗了臉，梳了頭，就去車間了。

sentences.english: This machine adapts to cleaning short fluff in cotton peeling workshops .
sentences.chinese: 該機適合於棉花加工剝絨車間隨機清理棉短絨之用。

sentences.english: Chemical materials business with the electronics factory shop environment is worse than some.
sentences.chinese: 化工材料企業的車間環境跟電子廠相比是差了一些。

sentences.english: Once the job hits the floor, it’s off to the races.
sentences.chinese: 一旦任務砸到車間，那就是一場封閉的賽跑了。

sentences.english: We have painted the operating platform with anticorrosive paint.
sentences.chinese: 對車間鋼結構操作平臺塗刷防鏽漆，做防鏽處理。

sentences.english: I’ve shaken hands with folks outside machine shops and churches,  corner stores and farms.
sentences.chinese: 我在機牀車間和教堂外，在小賣店和農場與人們握手。

sentences.english: After the picture is painted, it is to be mounted in the framing workshop.
sentences.chinese: 畫出畫面來以後，再到扎工車間去糊上。

sentences.english: I noticed a woman on the factory floor putting nozzles onto rubber hoses.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到一位女士在車間裏正往塑料軟管上裝噴嘴。

sentences.english: Be responsible for the costs of own workshop.
We need a factotum to take care of the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要一個雜役來負責車間的事情。

definition: a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
